Serialized Form

  • Package common.connectivity

    • Class common.connectivity.Message

      class Message extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • answer
          MessageFromServer answer
          Describes the result of the task completed by the server
        • data
          Object data
          The message data (e.g. User instance, List of Products etc..)
        • task
          MessageFromClient task
          Describes the task the client is asking the server to perform
